usage: Strength training and workout exercises at home or in the gym using free weights.
ai_description: A pair of compact purple hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth, grippy neoprene-style coating. Each weight features crisp white KAKSS branding and a clear 4 KG marking on the end. The solid, coated metal design and flat hex ends keep the dumbbells stable on flat surfaces.
target_audience: People looking for dumbbells for gym or home workouts, including fitness enthusiasts and home exercisers.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbell Set for Gym & Home Workouts – Pack of 2 (4kg Each) – Purple
